parameters.name: AppGroup
parameters.description: The group to which the application belongs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The time is accurate to seconds.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: Query
parameters.description: A query statement that complies with the query syntax of Simple Log Service Logstore. For more information, see the parameters corresponding to this operation on the console page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The time is accurate to seconds.
